title: Congress members’ flight clips wing
shortDescription: Two regional jets clipped their wings on the Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport tarmac. At least seven lawmakers were on board.

title: Senate confirms Trump pick Dan Caine as top US military officer
shortDescription: The Senate voted 60 to 25 to confirm Dan Caine on Friday as chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, two months after Trump fired his predecessor.

title: Daily Briefing: The GOP looks for trillions
shortDescription: Republicans begin to envision new tax and spending cuts. Here is the news to know on Friday.

title: US Army turns over helicopter safety memo to Congress
shortDescription: The U.S. Army has turned over to the Senate a 2024 Augustmemo detailing why it routinely failed to use a safety system known as ADS-B on helicopter flights around Reagan Washington National Airport, Senator Ted Cruz said.

title: Congress has kickstarted work on Trump's agenda: What to know
shortDescription: House Republicans can expect plenty of fights ahead on taxes, spending cuts and more.

title: China hits back at Trump tariff hike, raises duties on US goods to 125%
shortDescription: Beijing on Friday increased its tariffs on U.S. imports to 125%, hitting back against President Donald Trump's decision to hike duties on Chinese goods to 145%.

title: Timeframe for Trump's 'gold card' for the world's wealthy revealed
shortDescription: Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said Thursday the $5 million visa, would be available within a “week, week-and-a-half.”

title: Trump Administration cancels student visas
shortDescription: The Trump administration has cited reasons like roommate disputes and traffic tickets for canceling hundreds of international student visas.

title: Trump called it 'a great time to buy.' The market rose later that day.
shortDescription: Democrats are criticizing Donald Trump's Truth Social posts encouraging stock market investment hours before he paused many of his tariffs.

title: What's next for Trump's tariffs? Where the trade war goes from here.
shortDescription: President Trump said he would revive the tariffs he paused if countries do not agree to trade deals. Here's where the tariffs talk goes from here.

title: Mahmoud Khalil case: Trump administration doubles down on deportation
shortDescription: The Trump administration asserted that Mahmoud Khalil’s beliefs and activism could undermine U.S. efforts to combat antisemitism.

title: Campus protests vanish as Trump vows 'terrorist' crackdown
shortDescription: Some alumni groups are pushing their alma maters to strengthen protections for students and spend down endowments to buy freedom from Trump threats.

title: Like or hate daylight saving time? Senate panel can't decide
shortDescription: The Senate Commerce Committee took up the issue, which has bedeviled lawmakers for years - but it made no major progress, either.

title: House Republicans narrowly approve Trump’s agenda
shortDescription: House Republicans narrowly approved a blueprint for President Trump’s agenda, promising to find $1.5 trillion in cuts as part of the package.

title: It's not just Trump: Why Silicon Valley wants Greenland, too
shortDescription: Wealthy tech investors are promoting Greenland as the site for a libertarian utopia with minimal corporate regulation.

title: Will Trump's tariffs on China impact a TikTok deal? What we know
shortDescription: A potential deal with spin off TikTok's U.S. assets is still "on the table" days after it was put on hold, according to Trump.
